attributes.action: not contribute to the bail-out of Greece's economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Government have put the UK in debts of £697.5bn, or 47.5% of GDP, by the end of 2008 (according to The Guardian). This debt is now estimated at 1 trillion.

The UK cannot afford to give any more tax payers money out, especially to other countries.
